replies.body:
Unfortunately, there's not much the mods can do at this point. 
Because it's almost impossible to tell who in that team stacked, moderators cannot give out punishments to those who purposfully team stacked.
replies.body_tagged:

Because it's almost impossible to tell who in that team stacked, moderators cannot give out punishments to those who purposfully team stacked.

replies.body:
Hey Project, the staff team is aware of team stacking, at the moment we cant do much but if we are ingame and it does occur we will do our best to stop it. 
Thanks :D
replies.body_tagged:
Hey Project, the staff team is aware of team stacking, at the moment we cant do much but if we are ingame and it does occur we will do our best to stop it. 
Thanks :D

replies.body: Instead of public shaming the users who were team stacking, file a complaint to support@avicus.net OR file an online report.
replies.body_tagged: Instead of public shaming the users who were team stacking, file a complaint to support@avicus.net OR file an online report.
